readable.title: 3027397797_4f1d305ced
readable.content: A barefoot and shirtless skateboarder rides along a road . A man in shorts skateboards down the street . A skateboarder in striped shorts skating down a street . A teenager wearing striped shorts and no shirt is skateboarding down a road a long the ocean . Shirtless , tattooed man rides skateboard down blurring street near beach .
